name: Toasted Tinola Chicken
description: This Toasted Tinola Chicken recipe is packed with high-protein, and falls perfectly into the categories of low-carb and low-sugar meals. Designed for those seeking a healthier twist on traditional recipes, this dish is an ideal addition to your collection of Healthyfied, Healthy Recipes, and Healthified Recipes.

recipeInstructions.text: Prepare your ingredients: Peel and finely dice the red onion. Peel and minced the fresh ginger. Peel and mince the garlic.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Season the chicken with 1 tsp ground black pepper and 1.5 tsp(s) of salt, ensuring it's evenly coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large skillet over medium heat, sear the seasoned chicken until it is golden brown on all sides, about 5-7 minutes per side.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Remove the chicken and set aside. In the same skillet, add the diced red onion, minced garlic, and ginger. Saut√© until fragrant and translucent, about 3-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Add the browned chicken back into the skillet. Lower the heat and cover, allowing it to cook through, about 30 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Uncover, increase the heat to medium and continue cooking until the exterior of the chicken is crispy, about 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6
